20 // ros
21 #include <memory>
22 #include <ros/ros.h>
23 #include <string>
24 
25 // niryo
26 #include "can_driver/can_interface_core.hpp"
27 #include "conveyor_interface/conveyor_interface_core.hpp"
28 #include "ros/duration.h"
29 #include "ros/node_handle.h"
30 #include "ttl_driver/ttl_interface_core.hpp"
31 
32 int main(int argc, char **argv)
33 {
34  ros::init(argc, argv, "conveyor_interface_node");
35 
36  ROS_DEBUG("Launching conveyor_interface_node");
37 
38  ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(4);
39  spinner.start();
40 
41  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
42  ros::NodeHandle nh_conveyor("conveyor");
43 
44  std::string hardware_version;
45 
46  nh.getParam("hardware_version", hardware_version);
47 
48  std::shared_ptr<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore> ttl_driver;
49  std::shared_ptr<can_driver::CanInterfaceCore> can_driver;
50 
51  if (hardware_version == "ned2" || hardware_version == "ned3pro")
52  {
53  ros::NodeHandle nh_ttl("ttl_driver");
54  ttl_driver = std::make_shared<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore>(nh_ttl);
55  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
56  }
57 
58  if (hardware_version == "ned" || hardware_version == "one")
59  {
60  ros::NodeHandle nh_can("can_driver");
61  can_driver = std::make_shared<can_driver::CanInterfaceCore>(nh_can);
62  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
63  }
64 
65  auto conveyor_interface = std::make_shared<conveyor_interface::ConveyorInterfaceCore>(nh_conveyor, ttl_driver, can_driver);
66  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
67 
68  ros::waitForShutdown();
69  return 0;
70 }
